Title: Phantasmic Shield
Description: Target unit takes 2 less damage next turn.

Title: Axehound
Description: Target Brute deals +1 Damage on its next attack.

Title: Poison Arrow
Description: Target Archer deals +1 Damage on its next attack.

Title: Shadow's Edge
Description: Target Assassin deals +1 Damage on its next attack.

Title: King of the Hill
Description: Archer on a Plateau deals +2 Damage on its next attack.

Title: Farsight
Description: Archer gains +1 Range for this turn.

Title: Swift Foot
Description: Target unit gains +1 Movement for this turn.

Title: Spectral Shift
Description: Selected mage can move up to 5 hexes next turn

Title: In & Out Murder
Description: If target Assassin attack results in a kill this turn
Quantity: they gain +1 Movement for this turn.

Title: Transfusion
Description: Heal target unit plus 2 HP

Title: Martyr Protocol
Description: All units within 2 hexes of your Banner gain +2 Atk next turn. Casting Mage loses 1HP

Title: Shroud of Turino
Description: Assassin is invisible to enemies for one turn (cannot be attacked or nerfed)

Title: Raging Pulse
Description: Brute receives +3 damage on next attack

Title: Toe Rot
Description: Target enemy cannot perform a Move action on their next turn.

Title: Blinding Dust
Description: Target enemy's Range is reduced by 1 for their next turn.

Title: Brittle blade
Description: Target Brute deals -2 Damage on its next attack.

Title: Overwound Strings
Description: Target Archer deals -1 Damage on its next attack.

Title: Toe Rot
Description: Target enemy cannot perform a Move action on their next turn.

Title: Coward's Mark
Description: Target opponent unit cannot make an attack on their next turn.

Title: Grave Debt
Description: When target unit dies, the nearest enemy Mage loses 2 HP.

Title: Weight of Command
Description: Enemy Warlord loses 1 Atk for every ally currently adjacent to him.

Title: Traitor's Toll
Description: Force an enemy unit to deal 2 Damage to their own adjacent Warlord.

Title: Claws of crabs
Description: If targeted enemy unit has two of your units adjacent to it, +1 attack for each adjacent friendly unit

Title: Shatter Terra
Description: Selected mage can destroy an enemy plateau and kill any player on it

Title: Spinal Ripcord
Description: Warlord deals +2 Damage. Attack ignores all enemy Shields or Damage-reduction buffs.

Title: Soul Siphon
Description: Warlord deals +2 Damage. If the target dies, your Warlord heals 1 HP.

Title: Rampage
Description: Warlord gains one extra attack action this turn (must be used in same turn)

Title: Super Smash
Description: Warlord does +1 damage to all enemy units within two tiles of the attacked unit
